website_summaries.verdict: A quality grinder with sophisticated components. It can accommodate a wide range of ingredients, from chia seeds to whole coffee beans.
pros: Pulverizes flax seeds to powder, grinds whole coffee beans, minces garlic, and more
cons: One or two complaints about inconsistency of grind

customer_reviews.title: A nice grinder
customer_reviews.text: The grinder works well for spices ranging from black peppercorns, cumin, fennel seed, Szechuan peppercorn, ... The grinder includes two inner containers but only one lid for the inner containers. There should be at least two. I wish that spare grinding containers and inner lids were available as spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dekker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grinder
customer_reviews.text: So far, this grinder is the best I've ever had and I've owned several. It's fairly new so I can't attest to how long it will last but it seems sturdy and made of quality materials. Another reviewer claimed that it made a huge mess however, it comes with a tight fitting lid that fits the cup in which you grind or pulverize food preventing the contents from spilling out. I've tried the wet and dry grinding cups and both are very effective. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Wow....Washable..Yea!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this grinder is powerful and quiet and super easy to use and I toss it in the top rack of the dishwasher to clean. I like to grind my spices for the most flavor in my dishes. Star Anise is a tough smell to get out of a plastic wall grinder but this stainless steel cup solved the problem of my coffee tasting like Star Anise. I liked it so much that I bought another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Small print but powerful machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this nice looking small elegant but powerful spice grinder. Does a fantastic job with all spices, sugar, coffee, etc. Having two bowls is a big plus. The customer service is great! Definitely will recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This grinder has a powerful little motor, makes less noise than my former grinder and grinds to a much finer consistency (Turkish coffee !), and w 2 bowls makes grinding spices and herbs v easy w no cross contamination of flavours. Easy to clean. Get one !
customer_reviews.author: marie james

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Bought this product and it caught fire, reported it to the company and they immediately sent a replacement (which was appreciated) however, the replacement lasted longer than the first but eventually started smoking and we tossed before it too caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it died after a few months, then I ordered another one. That one died too. So I e-mailed the support and provided all the documents. They sent me a replacement, and it died too after a month. Three in a row died on me. What else can I say about the quality?
customer_reviews.author: shafiq rhaman

customer_reviews.title: DIED ON 2nd USE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grinding spices, not coffee. Added the spices into the 4 blade bowl and 30 seconds later I got my crushed paste. Works brilliantly. Easy to clean, just running water and a sponge. (careful of the blades) and dry. EDIT: 3/24/19 - The grinder died on its second use. The motor just gave out. Thankfully I was able to replace it with another, maybe a dud.
customer_reviews.author: xQapla

customer_reviews.title: For a spice grinder it’s not all it’s cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model after reading all “great” reviews. Motor burned out after first use grinding spices. ( smoke is not your friend) I like the metal grinding cups and the ability to clean, but if the motor won’t hold up it really doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: hookedinseattle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for such grinder for a long time. The most beneficial thing is that it comes with two Grinder Bowls. Manufacturer can improve by providing one more Clear Top Cover for Grinder Bowls as they included only one for two Bowls. Will buy one more in future.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Use for flaxseeds, quick
customer_reviews.text: I was just trying to find a flaxseed grinder, but had to sort through a lot of marijuana grinders to find this one. It works fast, grind to a powder, easy to clean. Just push the top down a couple times and it's done. (Yes, it would probably also work for marijuana- if you want a very fine grind) I have not used the second grinder cup for coffee beans. I like the plastic lid on each of the grinder cups- so I can use multiple times without regrinding. Very well made. Yes, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this to grind dried herbs, cinnamon and peppers. Also fresh horseradish and veggies. Whizzed thru them all with no problems. I Especially like the lid that fits on the stainless grinding container. Virtually all the 'dust' is contained inside the cup! The stainless cup removes easily. I was the parts by hand to ensure they last a long time. As for durability - time will tell. For now, I definitely recommend this grinder!!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not great for herbs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to grind herbs. The power is almost too much to where it doesn't chop the herbs enough. It leaves big pieces and dust from what it did chop.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for spices
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a couple of months but it works great so far. I use it only for grinding spices and it does a great job. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple does what you need.
customer_reviews.text: Good grinder compact easy to use easy clean wish it wasn't from China Amazon needs more American manufacture products but it is still really good when I filled it up to the max line I personally make two or 3 cups of coffee with what I grind and seal is pretty good that I just store my ground coffee in there until I'm ready to use it always stays fresh coffee taste way better than already ground coffee first time we have a ground coffee beans and it truly makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: R mill

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: After much research and lengthy review analyses, we decided upon this spice grinder and are so happy we did. Although we could use a mortar and pestle, this is our shortcut. We need to grind many spices for various meals, and this Secura grinds perfectly. Pictured is ground coriander. Cumin also ground well. Annatto seeds were still a little crumbly after one 30 second grind, but surely, after enough bursts, it will be perfectly ground too. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Operations

customer_reviews.title: I love my Secura products
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Secura product. The first one being my electric kettle. I am extremely happy with both my products. There were a lot of wet and dry grinders to choose from but I chose to go with this one only because I love my first product and am glad I did. I tried both dry and wet grinder cups and it definitely does a Fantastic job with both. I tried wet grinding 5 soaked almonds and a teaspoon of poppy seeds and it just made a very fine paste. The dry grinder pulverized pepper corns really fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Haiti

customer_reviews.title: Pay ATTENTION TO THE fill LEVEL.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but you MUST pay attention to the fill level indicator or you will wind up with a mess. I use it EVERY day to grind coffee beans for Espresso and Flax seeds for my families morning Smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: The chopper didn't work well. Haven't tried the grinder.
customer_reviews.text: After pushing down the lid gently and briefly a few times to get the chopper to spin, the gadget's underneath chord smoked. Gave it a rest, tried again, it sparked.
customer_reviews.author: N.A. Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder - Tried many and this is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have Tried a lot of the grinders to grind flax seeds and this the best, a little pricey otherwise I would have given it 5 stars. No waste which I wouldn’t say about others that you would find seeds underneath after grinding it even for better brands like cuisinart or kitchen aid.
customer_reviews.author: arale

customer_reviews.title: Well it died in a year
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2/2019 and used very lightly for grinding garlic ginger (mostly would leave chunks for garlic!!! Very light use and then tonight 9/30/20 thought of grinding Himalayan salt, boom it died!!! Rest in peace!!!! I dont know its warranty, but not a product to buy in future! EDIT: Warranty is 2 years, so SECURA is sending me a replacement. Good prompt responses so I have edited my rating to 4
customer_reviews.author: Cyclistan

customer_reviews.title: Very messy!
customer_reviews.text: It has a very cute design and doesn’t take up much space but it is very messy!! I put the nuts below the max line but as soon as I press the lid down to start grinding, ground nuts start coming out of the bowl and spill everywhere and especially around the grinder making it very hard to clean. I will be returning it. It does do a good job grinding though but I don’t want to spend all that time cleaning after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Belk

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered earlier than expected and the delivery guy thoughtfully knocked on my door. I took it out of the box immediately, found the cups stuck but I was able to pull them apart with the use of rubberized pot holders. The motor sounded powerful, easily grind by pressing the cover. I love that it has a separate top clear lid to avoid spilling the coffee beans. And I love that there is one more cup with 4 blades for herbs and spices. I gave 4 stars for durability and will update if needed. I hope this will last better than the first one I used for 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is just what I wanted to grind herbs. My picture is of Epazote leaves. Worked just like I wanted. I have used it to grind many herbs that don't come already ground. I just pour them into my grinder and then back into the bottle. Happy that I found this. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 90 days and then it started smoking
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this - especially based on the reviews - and it's been a great addition to my kitchen. Unfortunately, last night it started smoking and the place started stinking like fried electronics and became completely inoperable. I reached out to the company hoping for a replacement as it's conveniently outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: claudezachary

customer_reviews.title: Throws everything it grinds out of the bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and quiet grinder. Unfortunately no matter how firmly you press the lid down, at least half of the coffee you're grinding will get thrown out of the bowl and out of the cup, and then onto the counter as soon as the lid is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Messy & Not Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, I do NOT recommend this product.This product is the worst grinder I have ever bought. I purchased this product to grind spices. The first time I use the product I thought I over filled it because the content of the bowl was blowing ever where. I had spices all over my counter. So, the second I used this product, I only put a 1/4 of what I had before and it did it again. I have used this product twice and I purchased it 5 weeks ago & I can't return it now. I guess it'll just take up space in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Black

customer_reviews.title: This solved all my grinder troubles.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder that is super easy to use. Easy to clean. Looked at many different grinders and took a chance on this one, so glad I did as it works great for my espresso, percolator and drip coffee maker. I like many different types of coffee that require different grinds. This one works for every kind. It so amazingly easy to keep clean! Great choice. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Emery

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect for 31/2 months, then stop working. Unable to get refund through Amazon or company who sell this item. I am afraid I lost my money. Live on Social Security and cannot afford to loose any money, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Silmia Thorn-Sermeno

customer_reviews.title: A decent spice grinder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grinder specifically for grinding spices. It does the job at a reasonable price. The 2 things I think could be improved are: 1) the ground spices get into the many nooks & crannies making it hard to fully clean; 2) the inner lid does not hold very tightly and sometimes the spices "escape". I've tried smaller and larger quantities and the same thing happens especially with very strong spices like cardamom. Other than that, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Five stars, no issues in the last 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review a few months after the purchase. I’m very picky with materials & ingredients — and prefer stainless steel for it’s safety & non-toxicity. We use this grinder almost everyday in an Indian kitchen to grind up spices, nuts & make chutneys. Works perfectly & everything grinds so fast. Note: Make sure you only grind using 4-8 second pulses as mentioned in the manual and you’ll have no problems whatsoever. Read & follow the instructions on how to use & wash carefully.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Defective piece- fire started coming out
customer_reviews.text: Never buy this product. When I used it for the first time, fire started coming out from the bottom. It’s highly unsafe and scary. Bought this brand for the first time but never again .
customer_reviews.author: Rubina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for grinding spices and it does an exceptional job. In the past I have always ground my cinnamon (from sticks) by hand in order to get the grind that I wanted. I've tried other products and just wind up beating the tar out of them. This grinder took my cinnamon sticks down to powder in less than 30 seconds. I was skeptical before I used it, but now I am a believer. I love this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: T E W

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how people are rating this with 5 stars!!! I was so happy to read the reviews and got it based on them, but I wsd shocked when I tried it, you get whatever u grind out of it on the borders and once u lift the lid, you will have it all over ur counter. In returned it and never gonna trust the reviews over here.
customer_reviews.author: Sura

customer_reviews.title: All stainless steel plus 2 grinding containers.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this grinder yet, but bought one for my son- in Law (the same)several years ago and have used it when visiting & my daughter likes it for all her herbs & spices & I love grinding coffee beans. I’ts all stainless steel works easy & great & compact.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for Small Grinding Jobs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine. It’s simple and it does the job fast. It’s a little tricky to clean though. Whatever you’re finding gets stuck underneath the blade. So, to clean it it, I’ve had to soak it in a little water. If these parts were detachable, that would take care of the problem. I also had a tough time unpacking it because the the cups were wrapped in plastic and nested together, they got stuck. So, it took me about 15 minutes to get the cups apart without damaging them. Nevertheless, I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who needs to do small grinding jobs such as chia and flax seeds. I haven’t tried going coffee yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to grind up chili's to make chili powder. My smaller food processor didn't do the job. This grinder is perfect. It ground them all up with no problem. Super easy to clean. I really like the metal bowls as I know they won't be picking up smells from other foods. I can't wait to grind up more spices from the garden. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TM HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Indian kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product from past few weeks and it is perfect for grinding spices. Being Indian we appreciate freshly grind spices. It’s bowls(jars) are little small but perfect for everyday use. I have used it for grinding dry spices and ginger garlic paste. It works like pro without making much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Manik

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage unit to grind coffee/spices
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look and feel of this blender. My purpose for getting this grinder was for spices. I love that it has an inner lid to cover the spice grinding portion; and I also love that it comes with a spare set of blade so you have a two-blade grinder and four-blade grinder in one machine. And the grinding cup is pretty big so you can grind a large quantity in a short amount of time. The only downside to this is that you have to keep the top held to grind. There is no option to leave the grinder on for a certain amount of time. Other than that, the grinder itself is very chic and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Sobia A

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me who love to make own spice mix at home please invest in this item . From dry spice powder to any kind of thick paste
customer_reviews.author: Hima

customer_reviews.title: Works well, large capacity
customer_reviews.text: This product grinds coffee well but is noisy and not as fast as reported. Takes about 30 seconds (3 - 10 second bursts) to grind to my liking. Grinder bowl can easily hold enough coffee for 14 cup coffee maker with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Cay

customer_reviews.title: Great Spice Grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Tonight I received my spice/coffee grinder and have already ground my first spices. I was VERY IMPRESSED with the build quality and the speed at which the grinder operates. It looks very nice sitting on the counter. I had some spices put together in a matter of minutes and the grinder ground them up into a fine powder in just a matter of seconds. The smell of fresh taco seasoning is DIVINE! Also the machine is not overly loud.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little grinder for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking for a little grinder for coffee in the morning, and this thing works wonders. It looks like a stylish tiny blender, has two sets of blades, and does the job perfectly. It's easily cleanable and I like how it has the measurements on the inside of the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny N

customer_reviews.title: Operate in pulses and it will serve you well
customer_reviews.text: Powerful dry grinder and works easy. Cumin seeds grounded to very fine powder form
customer_reviews.author: pvtsam

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says really well!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good spice and herb grinder forever, my old coffee bean grinder was ok but definitely couldn't handle things like peppercorns. This little beauty is amazing with everything,band on top of that it's super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: TerMac

customer_reviews.title: great time saver
customer_reviews.text: I cook with a lot of garlic, ginger, chili and other spices. Before I used to painstakingly chop them into small pieces. Or use my small food processor to chop them up. But I usually hand chopped because of the cleaning needed for the food processor. I feel this product gives me the best of both worlds. I just throw the ingredients in and they are chopped in seconds. But importantly its so easy to clean. I find I'm using this far more than I expected. My only negative comment would be.......at times I wish it was slight bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I have tried blending dried shallots and the grinder powered through it in just a few seconds to a fine powder. The grinder seems to be solidly made. There is some weight to it with the metal build. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: What a great coffee grinder! Actually, I bought it to grind dehydrated mango pieces. They were such a mess and so time consuming in my other grinder that I bought this one. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Niskin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Exactly what I wanted. I use this for spices and to make small quantities of sauces. Does the job brilliantly. Elegant design. So easy to clean. Would recommend it to anyone. I had a Krups spice grinder before this which stopped working after 5 uses and it was also impossible to clean. Soooo happy with this new purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Subpar
customer_reviews.text: If your planning on grinding anything longer than a couple minutes, this grinder is not for you. The motor quickly overheats and you have to wait 45 minutes to be able to use again.
customer_reviews.author: WormZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: This is very bad product. We used it for only three times and it's just gone bad! It's not working anymore. As one month of return time ( 5 days more) got over, so I am unable to replace this item. It's just wastage of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Basu

customer_reviews.title: not happy with this item.
customer_reviews.text: i did not like this item at all, I recently bought this item and once i rcvd it i tried using it but as i turn it on the grinder i can see some sparks at the bottom and i can smell the burning of plastic wire and there is some black dust in a square shape left at the bottom. I am scared to use it.
customer_reviews.author: punam

customer_reviews.title: Great to Grind coffee and Spices
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 2 months now. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Feels like a solid good quality product. I love the fact that I can also grind some wet pastes/chutneys super fine. Also really apprciate the secure lid to the blending container because all the product being ground is contained and no spills occur. I used a Kitchen Aid before this and the lid was too loose and did not contain the product being ground. Overall 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended this product
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this for almost 4 months and can confirm that it really is an excellent grinder, far better than the previous ones I've had. I always wanted the grinder for Indian spices. And it's the perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: Sukanya-Tejas Patil

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and very very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and nifty. Very easy to clean. Perfect for grinding spices. The wet jar is very useful to make grind vegetables and baby food. Have had it for only couple of months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its not magic but its pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, who is a great cook. He says it works well, on most spices. He said it didn’t grind fenugreek well but works great on peppercorns and cumin.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. A couple design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used lots of coffee grinders. When you use one, you don’t want it to make a mess. Every time I use this, grinds come out over the top and when you take the lid off they spill out. The only reason I’m still using it is because I feel stupid for not buying the same one I’ve used for a long time. A kitchen aid one. Pros are, it looks pretty when you clean it and it grinds the beans well.
customer_reviews.author: amsalkeld

customer_reviews.title: Durability...
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it worked like a charm. Bought it September 2019 and after a month of very light usage the product stopped working. I am unable to return the product at Amz as it passed a month. I am very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Grinds small seeds effectively
customer_reviews.text: Grinds seeds very effectively and doesn’t make the seeds clump up like my other grinder. Highly recommend for small seeds- like flax or sesame seeds. Easy to clean! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product. Very useful for dry grinding as well as make paste. Comes with 2 blades and containers. Coffee grinding - supurb Making Paste - supurb Durability - will come to know 😀
customer_reviews.author: Anamika Sarkar

customer_reviews.title: Great utility!! Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Loved every bit of the machine. The only reason I feel hesitant to give it a 5 star is the plastic lid of the grinder attachment that didn't withstand the quality test. It broke within the first 2 months. It is almost a required part to run the machine
customer_reviews.author: Idk

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget ❤
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget ❤ I have this for almost a year and I use it for grinding dry spices, for garlic and ginger paste and for chutneys regular basis. I looked for a long time before buying it and absolutely love it. For someone who cooks as much as me this is a must. Works great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Spice grinder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a year back and have been using it without any issues so far. I bought it specifically for grinding spices which are kind of hard and need fine grinding. This one does the job quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimesh

customer_reviews.title: Overdesigned with loud rattle when motor runs: junk.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new unit makes unacceptable loud rattling noise when motor is turned on. Unit is overdesigned, requiring that both a lid and the top cover be in place before the motor will operate.
customer_reviews.author: no doubt

customer_reviews.title: You deserve this grinder!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that this grinder was topping just about every must buy list, I had to give it a try! We usually use a mortar and pestle, which can be time consuming. I want easy sometimes in the kitchen! This thing is awesome!!!!! It pulverized our toasted rice to an amazingly fine powder. Just do NOT forget to use the secondary clear lid when using this grinder, I learned that the messy way. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Warr

customer_reviews.title: Not enough blending power
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except I wish it had more power. It doesn’t quite blend things as well as I would like. Not as fine ground as I need.
customer_reviews.author: Daydreamer1992

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to clean. They are all nosey when grinding the beans, but very steady on table. It’s a nice compact grinder.
customer_reviews.author: J don

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel do not submerge the motor in water, best washed by hand with a small brush.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stainless steel and the two containers. Spices can be intense and hard to clean and not get smells mixing. This product has two blades options and easy to clean. The performance is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Top choice
customer_reviews.text: I really love this grinder over any other one I’ve had. I primarily use it for spices in a professional kitchen. Having multiple cups is great and the newer model with the lid for while you grind is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: paul parrish

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: Good price.It is all stainless steel except the lid. Better than other small blender which is plastic . I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee K

customer_reviews.title: Removable bowls are a must have
customer_reviews.text: Best feature about the Secura electric coffee grinder is the 2 removable stainless steel bowls. We owned the Krups version before which doesn't have removable bowls. Washing it was a pain when using it for different ingredients that you don’t want to contaminate the tastes. This nullifies that issue. Its very well built and thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Easy to Use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Base and general size is larger than ideal for my limited space, but I love the two removable stainless easy-clean grinder cups with greater capacity than the typical small coffee grinder. Decent length cord. Not happy that price increased significantly while I waited for it to come back in stock. However I like this machine and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Cute to look, but powerful at work
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing for grinding coffee seeds...And spices too. These are nicely ground, enough for my purposes and taste. The best thing is how quick things can be done with this cute machine.
customer_reviews.author: PP critic

customer_reviews.title: Just right for making curries.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Economical. Does a great job grinding or chopping small quantities. Safe to use. Doesn't take much space. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: Great little blender with washable bowls
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, functionality and washability of the bins. So far used the 4 blade bowl for semi dry things like ginger and garlic and the 2 blade one for dry grinding spices and even sugar before baking. Forgot to put the lid on the bowl once, it would have been really nice if another lid could have been included with the box so we could store each bowl independently
customer_reviews.author: Arvind

customer_reviews.title: Great little grinder
customer_reviews.text: We use it for coffee and spices. It sometimes won't make the spices super fine but it's still a pretty great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Overall great handy product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am satisfied by the performance of this little guy. Cleaning below the blades is little tricky but I guess that is true for any blender unless the blades come off. The only concerning thing I can think of is its power. This machine is not very powerful and it takes some time to break medium sized stuff. Like it did not grind the ginger 2" piece at the first go, took a couple of cycles.
customer_reviews.author: RUDRAJIT SENGUPTA

customer_reviews.title: Essential Kitchen Arsenal
customer_reviews.text: What a find! Ultra sharp blades and smooth operation. My wife loves it and it’s a real eye catcher too. Happy Home!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E. NORTH, JR.

customer_reviews.title: Great blender and awesome no plastic option
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I didn't have this, no plastic,quick to clean, using it heavily to make basil pesto as well as spices like garam masalas
customer_reviews.author: gaurav juneja

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little coffee grinder! Works very well, easy to clean, doesn’t take up much space, all the parts that touch my coffee beans are metal not plastic, very efficient! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good sturdy product but I couldn’t get it to grind my herbs so I returned it. I’m sure it’s great for coffee beans but that is not what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedane

customer_reviews.title: GRINDS STONES TOO
customer_reviews.text: THIS COFFEE GRINDER LITERALLY GRINDS ANYTHING TO SMOOTH BUTTERY STUFF. WE USE THIS TO MAKE PEANUT BUTTER AND WE ARE AMAZED AT ITS CONSISTENCY.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grinder - Efficient performance with solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality grinder that serves multiple purposes. Originally, I purchased this so I could grind my own coffee beans. As a bonus, this grinder doubles as a smaller food processor featuring a separate bowl and blade that can be swapped in with ease. I like having separate bowls. This seems like a durable appliance built with quality that I expect to have for years to come. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the first few times I used it. After that the product just died. Regret it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SankaraN

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, I bought it for grinding spices (which I did and worked perfectly) and coffee beans ( again worked perfectly). Easy to use and clean. Also I wanted something that could sit on my counter without taking up a lot of room and look nice , which gets a 5 star for both.
customer_reviews.author: Our grandchildren

customer_reviews.title: Did its job.
customer_reviews.text: Only downside was having to wait for it to cool down in order to continue grinding, example would be spearmint being ground into powder.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grinder only 3 times and it is already not working. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sujeeta thakali

customer_reviews.title: Efficient for small quantities
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it in an Indian household of two for making chutneys, onion, ginger, garlic pastes for 4 months now. Its efficient and works well if loaded in moderation. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for peppercorns
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my kitchenaid coffee grinder. This does a much better job on things like peppercorns.
customer_reviews.author: David Shackney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Still works fine, stopped working once, then back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Omar Al Maani

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so versatile when it comes to grinding. If you make curries this is a useful tool for preping spices. I love the fact that it is easy to use and that you get two different grinding bowls for coffee and spices. Love this thing !!
customer_reviews.author: Hman

customer_reviews.title: Spice Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Used for grinding spices and chopping nuts. Appreciate the 2 different bowls which makes switching out use easy. Metal bowls means less odor transfer when used multiple times in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and the business is based in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I like American made products and the ease of use, ease of clean up and reasonable price. This product works great, you couldn't ask for better quality. Make your purchase of this Secura Electric Coffee Grinder and Spice Grinder with confidence, you won't be sorry you did.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey2u

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It is very good grinder, the only one thing is too small amount of coffee beans to grind . But overall is good grinder
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and used it today for the first time and I’m really impressed with the design. It is so different from the usual grinder. The grinding bowl is removable from the base and can be cleaned easily. There is a grinder cup and a chopper cup. It was a great price and what more can I say? I think I’m going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Donoho

customer_reviews.title: good construction sold grinder
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of different spices it is important to have easy cleaning and stainless steel construction
customer_reviews.author: gift buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a almost a year and I am die hard fan for this product. Last week I had issues with Product and customer service replace my old one with new one. Amazing customer service and will definitely buy it again from this merchant. This grinder is pretty good for grining spices and making Chutney's. easy to clear and use..
customer_reviews.author: keyur patel

customer_reviews.title: Chutyney grinder  is what it is for me
customer_reviews.text: The grinder is amazing specially if you want to make Chutneys . The blades are pretty sharp. Griding Spices also works like a charm. The top cover is plastic quality not good . Feels like it can be broken very easily. That is why gave a 4 start rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gyan Shanker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it.. She is happy with it, so that makes me a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran

customer_reviews.title: electric coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: nice stainless steel coffee/spice grinder hat looks and works good plus they stock replacement blades for the future when the blades get worn out... very happy
customer_reviews.author: scott

product_meta.title: Secura Electric Coffee Grinder and Spice Grinder with 2 Stainless Steel Blades Removable Bowls
feature_bullets: Two removable Stainless Steel bowls, one grinder bowl and one chopper bowl
Grind Coffee beans & spices; chops nuts and vegetables
Secura Coffee grinder comes with build-in smart Overheat protection, extends motor lifespan
Stainless Steel blades and Stainless Steel exterior
Safety-lock lid, on/off switch, cord wrap base. 2-Year manufacturer's limited warranty. Only for use with North American Electrical standards, 120V
